text: Koly my resurrected yim, vony zapytuvaly odyn odnoho, "Yak dovhi vy tut?" "My buly tut odnym dnem abo chastynoyu dnya," vony vidpoviyily. "Vash Lord znaye krashchi yak dovhi my zalyshylysya tut, tak dozvolyayemo nam posylayemo odyn z nas z tsymy hroshamy do mista. Dozvolʹte yomu prynosyatʹ naybilʹsh chyste prodovolʹstvo, ta kupuyutʹ deyaki dlya nas. Dozvolʹte yomu derzhatʹ nyzʹkyy profilʹ, ta prytyahayutʹ niyaku uvahu
